articles.title: Jim Cantore experienced thundersnow live on air in Plymouth Monday morning, and freaked out
articles.description:
The Weather Channel meteorologist is on record about loving that particular phenomenon.

summary: Jim Cantore experienced thundersnow live on air in Plymouth on February 23.
Thundersnow is a rare weather phenomenon that can impact local travel conditions.
Residents should prepare for potential disruptions due to severe winter weather.

articles.title: Nearly 1,000 flights cancelled at Logan Airport due to nor’easter
articles.description:
"Passengers are advised to check with their airline on the status of their flight before coming to the airport," wrote Massport in a weather advisory.

The post Nearly 1,000 flights cancelled at Logan Airport due to nor’easter appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Nearly 1,000 flights were cancelled at Logan Airport due to a nor’easter.
Massport advises passengers to check flight statuses before arriving at the airport.
Travel disruptions affect thousands of Boston residents during the storm.

articles.title: 9 thoughts on the Red Sox, leading off with Roman Anthony’s potential sophomore season
articles.description:
As Boston Red Sox pin hopes on Triston Casas, a full season from Roman Anthony could define 2026 — and determine whether Boston’s promise turns into power.

The post 9 thoughts on the Red Sox, leading off with Roman Anthony’s potential sophomore season appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Boston Red Sox rely on Triston Casas and Roman Anthony for 2026 season success.
Roman Anthony's performance could significantly influence team dynamics and fan expectations.
A strong sophomore season from Anthony may enhance local support and attendance.

articles.title: Johnny Gaudreau’s memory surrounded Team USA during run to Olympic gold
articles.description:
"I feel like he’s following us."

The post Johnny Gaudreau’s memory surrounded Team USA during run to Olympic gold appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Team USA won Olympic gold, inspired by Johnny Gaudreau's memory during the tournament.
Gaudreau, a Boston native, was honored by teammates throughout the competition.
His legacy strengthens community ties among local hockey players and fans in Boston.
